sentence.Network_en: He became rebarbative and prickly and spiteful; I find his obsequiousness repellent.
sentence.Network_cn: 他变得令人讨厌、易发怒,怀有恶意; 我发现他的奉承令人厌恶.

sentence.Network_en: He was free from all sycophancy or obsequiousness in the face of the reactionary ruling class.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在反动统治阶级面前没有丝毫的奴颜与媚骨.

sentence.Network_en: I told him to get lost and leave me alone and his tone quickly changed from obsequiousness to outright anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 我叫他滚开，不要来烦我，他的口气一下子就从逢迎谄媚变成了勃然大怒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 媚字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 媚眼,媚眼儿〖 seductiveeyes〗 媚骨〖 obsequiousness〗 媚惑〖 confusebyattractiveappearance〗.
名著精读《傲... ... 12.clergyman n. 牧师，教士，神职人员 13.obsequiousness n. 奉承，谄媚 14.self-importance n. 自尊，自负，自大.

list.abs: hear ye , hear ye the drum roll begins , an usher to the rolling waves catapulting towards your obsequious shores .你们听吧，听到那隆隆鼓声开始响起，它预示着滚滚而来的巨浪正投射向你们这卑微的彼岸。
the first care of the young bird as soon as fledged , and able to trust to his wings , is to perform the obsequies of his father .一旦羽翼丰满就接管幼鸟最初照料责任，以及能够信赖它的翅膀，将要完成他父亲的葬礼的任务。
Chandler ' s weasel face screwed into an obsequious smile ., 钱德勒黄鼠狼似的脸上现出了谄媚的笑容.

his obsequious behavior made everyone nervous . he was always rushing and perform other small tasks , apologizing unnecessarily for any inconvenience that he might have caused .他总是逢迎的态度使每个人都不安。他经常冲出门去做些小事，为任何他可能造成的不便而进行不必要的道歉。

entry.def: If you describe someone as obsequious, you are criticizing them because they are too eager to help or agree with someone more important than them.

example.ex: Barrow was positively obsequious to me until he learnt that I too was the son of a labouring man.
example.tran: 巴罗竭力讨好我，直到得知我也是工人家庭出身。

auth_sentence.content: His debating opponent submerged Motahari's heresies in a wave of obsequiousness.
auth_sentence.res_content: His debating opponent submerged Motahari's heresies in a wave of obsequiousness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His debating opponent submerged Motahari's heresies in a wave of obsequiousness.

auth_sentence.content: Over the twenty years of the friendship, the stationery and the handwriting change, but the obsequiousness never wavers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Over the twenty years of the friendship, the stationery and the handwriting change, but the obsequiousness never wavers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Over the twenty years of the friendship, the stationery and the handwriting change, but the obsequiousness never wavers.
